thread.title: Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder

title: Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder
text:
May 30, 2018 / 2:39 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago Russian journalist Babchenko turns up alive after reported murder Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
KIEV (Reuters) - A Russian dissident journalist who was reported murdered in Kiev dramatically reappeared alive and well on Wednesday in the middle of a briefing about the killing by the Ukrainian state security service. Russian journalist Arkady Babchenko (C), who was reported murdered in the Ukrainian capital on May 29, Ukrainian Prosecutor General Yuriy Lutsenko (R) and head of the state security service (SBU) Vasily Gritsak attend a news briefing in Kiev, Ukraine May 30, 2018. REUTERS/Valentyn Ogirenko
The head of the security service said it had received information about a Russian plot to kill Kremlin critic Arkady Babchenko and managed to prevent it.
Babchenko thanked the Ukrainian security service for saving his life. Reporting by Pavel Polityuk; writing by Matthias Williams; editing by John Stonestreet
